attributes.action: Introduce either 5 or 4 year fixed term of goverment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government to bring before the houses of parliament a bill to fix the term of government to either 4 or five years unless a vote of no confidence is enforced. This should save £millions.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
